title: Kundan Emerald Floral Kasu Haaram - A Timeless Heritage Piece
materials: Natural Rubies (Garuda Pasupu). Hyderabad Polish for lasting shine and durability.
features: Intricate Kundan setting with delicate floral motifs. Features central emerald pendant with traditional 'kasu' or coin details integrated into the design. Each floral element is meticulously hand-placed. The pendant has small round drops that give movement and light.
colors: Sparkling White (Kundan). The green and red offer a beautiful contrast against the gold.
occasions: and traditional South Indian celebrations like Seemantham (సీమంతం)
Half-Saree function (Langa Voni Function/లంగా వోణి వేడుక). Also suitable for grand evening events and festive occasions.
description: This Kundan Emerald Floral Kasu Haaram is a statement piece, embodying the rich cultural heritage of South India. The exquisite craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and value. It is a symbol of prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom. The combination of Kundan and traditional South Indian design ensures a piece that is both timeless and elegant.
